title: Neon Circuit Wallpapers.
content: Neon Circuit Wallpapers is your go-to website for high-quality, neon-colored circuitry wallpapers. Our collection features a variety of repeating patterns set against black backgrounds, perfect for adding a futuristic touch to your desktop or mobile device. Whether you're a tech enthusiast or just looking to spice up your screen, our selection has something for everyone. With easy browsing and downloading options, it's never been easier to give your device a sleek and modern look. Upgrade your wallpaper game with Neon Circuit Wallpapers today!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a repeating pattern of neon-colored circuitry, set against a black background."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
